Module Simulator
Package kin.model

Class ComponentModel

java.lang.Object
kin.model.ComponentModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BodyModel, LinearMotorModel, PassiveElementModel, SegmentModel, ServoModel, TConnectorModel, TerminationPointModel, TouchPointModel, TouchSegmentModel
public abstract class ComponentModel
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract upperclass for any static component.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ComponentModel()
    Create a component.

    Create a copy of the component without any connections to fix- or tail-side-parts.

  • Method Details

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription​(java.lang.String description)
      Set a description for printing and debugging purpose.
      Parameters:
      description - description

    • getDescription

      public java.lang.String getDescription()
      Get a description for printing and debugging purpose. If it was not set by the model developer, an automatic string is computed.
      Returns:
      description

    • setFixSidePartModel

      public void setFixSidePartModel​(FixSidePartModel fixSidePartModel)
      Set the fix-side-part. This part can only set once.
      Parameters:
      fixSidePartModel - fix-side-part

    • getFixSidePartModel

      public FixSidePartModel getFixSidePartModel()
      Get the fix-side-part, if any.
      Returns:
      fix-side-part

    • getConnectionPointModels

      public ConnectionPointModel[] getConnectionPointModels()
      Get the connection points to the tail-side-parts.
      Returns:
      the connection points to the tail-side-parts

    • createDynamicComponent

      public abstract Component createDynamicComponent()
      Get the dynamic component instance from this static model object.
      Returns:
      dynamic component

    • createCopy

      public abstract ComponentModel createCopy()
      Create a copy of the component without any connections to fix- or tail-side-parts. Also the description is not copied.
      Returns:
      copy

    • createTailChain

      public static ComponentModel createTailChain​(ComponentModel... componentModels)
      Connnects all components among each other. This means, the n-th entry is considered as the tail-side-part of the n-1th entry. In turn, the n-1th entry is the fix-side-part of the n-th entry. The birectionaly references that reflect this are stored in the components.
      Parameters:
      componentModels - all components in the sequence from fix-side to tail-side. The last component must be a touch point
      Returns:
      the first component of the array
